name: @blockchainhub/coco
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox.

scripts.build: npm run build-ltr && npm run build-rtl
scripts.build-ltr: npm run build-add-version && npm run build-clean && npm run build-css-ltr && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run build-cleancss && npm run build-sass && if [ "$GITHUB_ACTIONS" != "true" ]; then npm run build-remove-version; fi
scripts.build-rtl: npm run build-add-version-rtl && npm run build-clean && npm run build-css-rtl && npm run build-autoprefix-rtl && npm run build-cleancss-rtl && npm run build-rtl-to-ltr && if [ "$GITHUB_ACTIONS" != "true" ]; then npm run build-remove-version; fi
scripts.build-add-version: awk 'NR==2 && /^\$v:/ {sub(/^\$v:.*/, "$v: \"$(echo $npm_package_version)\";")} NR!=2 || !/^\$v:/ {print} NR==1 {print "$v: \"$(echo $npm_package_version)\";"}' style/coco.scss > temp && mv temp style/coco.scss
scripts.build-add-version-rtl: npm run build-add-version && sed -i.old '3s;false;true;' style/coco.scss && rm -rf style/coco.scss.old
scripts.build-remove-version: awk 'NR==2 && /^\$v:/ {next} {print}' style/coco.scss > temp && mv temp style/coco.scss
scripts.build-css: npm run build-css-ltr && npm run build-css-rtl
scripts.build-sass: cp -a style dist/sass && stripcomments -w --language=Sass --confirm-overwrite dist/sass/**/*.scss && spaces-to-tabs dist/sass/**/*.scss -s 2
scripts.pack: VER=$(echo $npm_package_version | sed s/[.]/-/g) && mv dist coco-v$npm_package_version && zip -r coco-v$VER.zip coco-v$npm_package_version && mv coco-v$npm_package_version dist
scripts.check-browsersync: npm list -g | grep browser-sync || npm install -g browser-sync --no-shrinkwrap
scripts.start: npm run build-css && browser-sync start --config test/bs-config.js
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run check-browsersync && npm run build-docs && npm run compress
scripts.tab:watch: ttab -t 'Watching SASS files' npm exec npm-watch
